ValidationRule.description: Lock sales from moving or making edits to a Closed Won opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Admin")), NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Operations")), NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Finance")), NOT(contains( $Profile.Name, "Manager Customer Success")), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "CW - Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Opportunity is Closed Won and is no longer eligible for general edits. Please contact Sales Operations, Finance, or a System Administrator for approval of post Closed Won edits.
